text: Monica Havelka (April 21, 1956 - July 12, 2009) was an American rower. She competed in the women's double sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. Prior to rowing at the Olympics, she played basketball. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2009 deaths Category:American female rowers Category:American women's basketball players Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Santa Ana, California Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Rowers at the 1983 Pan American Games
title: Monica Havelka
